title: Napkin Art Contest
short_description: All you need is a WHITE 5"x5" COCKTAIL NAPKIN and a PEN to show us that the art of the sketch is still alive! All entries will become part of an art wall inside the Grand Tavern by David Burke. 1 Grand Prize winner and four Honorable Mentions will be chosen!
long_description:
All you need is a WHITE 5"x5" COCKTAIL NAPKIN and a PEN to show us that the art of the sketch is still alive! 

All entries will become part of an art wall inside the Grand Tavern by David Burke

1 Grand Prize winner will be chosen and 4 Honorable Mention winners will also be selected. 

All six winners will be featured in the Spring issue of Storyteller

The Grand Prize winner will receive a 1 night stay and dinner for 2 at The Grand Tavern by David Burke

Sketches of winners, runner-ups, and honorable mentions will be posted on all AHH social media outlets and the AHH website. 

Have questions? 

Email Ozzie Salcedo at ozzie.salcedo@angadartshotel.com or our general information email address info@angadartshotel.com

 

HOW TO ENTER

- Sketches must be drawn on a white 5"x5" cocktail napkin using ink or ballpoint pen (no paint, no pencil)

- On a separate piece of paper include your Name, Address, Email, Phone & Napkin Title

- Multiple entries are allowed and encouraged

- All submissions must be mailed or dropped off at Angad Arts Hotel and no later than October 30th 2018

Angad Arts c/o Napkin Art

3550 Samuel Shepard Dr.

St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

 

Send us your email to get on our A-List mailer for all bookings and event info.
